title: Archive: Denmark v Germany - Euro 1992
body_text:
Archive: Denmark v Germany - Euro 1992

There was an error
Relive Denmark's shock victory in the Euro 92 final over world champions Germany in Gothenburg.
Watch Denmark v Germany in full, Thursday 25 June, 14:30 BST, on BBC Two and iPlayer.
Watch Uefa Euro 2020 next summer across the BBC.
